vsParam:
Right, [px]. Something suddenly occurred to me.
Can we make some medicine to wake Netl up?

Like the sobering medicine that woke Wistyria up.
What do you think?

It occurred to me too.
I think [px] will make it, totally.

... You're right. That client looks suspicious,
so I want Angelica to quit such a risky job.

If [px] could make the medicine, Angelica will not
have to deliver paintings anymore.
Yup. Probably, we should start with the recipe...

What do you think, [px]?
Can you make it?
I'd like to give it a try...

Hehe, that's great, [px]!
Sorry, I suggested that on a whim. So, we'll count on you!

Sorry, I suggested that on a whim!
[px], we'll count on you!

I need your attention, everybody!
[px] has figured out the recipe for the medicine!

Really!?
... Wait, you don't look excited at all. What's wrong?

I'm sorry. Can you show me the recipe?
... I see... It's a pain.

Something special called Neutralizer is needed to synthesize
the medicine. But we're not sure if it's available in the nearby shops...

Oh, how about this?
Let's check it with the trade caravan over there?

A great trade caravan was unloading
when we just arrived in Ribrum, did you see it?

Oh, I remember. Exactly.
The good news is, [px] has solved the hardest part, the recipe!

It'll be such a pity if we give up now!
Everybody! Let's check it with the trade caravan!
